name: tidb-cloud-serverless
description: MCP server for TiDB Cloud Serverless database operations
long_description:
This extension provides a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that enables AI assistants to interact with TiDB Cloud Serverless databases. It offers tools for database management, querying, and executing SQL statements with full support for TiDB's features including vector search.

## Features
- Database and table management
- SQL query execution with parameter binding
- Transaction support
- User management
- Vector search capabilities
- Secure credential handling

## Configuration
The extension can be configured using environment variables or user configuration options.

tools.name: show_databases
tools.description: Show all databases in the TiDB cluster

tools.name: switch_database
tools.description: Switch to a specific database with optional credentials

tools.name: show_tables
tools.description: Show all tables in the current database

tools.name: db_query
tools.description: Execute SELECT queries on the TiDB database

tools.name: db_execute
tools.description: Execute INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, CREATE, DROP operations
